topic: using stereo gl in os x
body:
Now that os x supports stereo gl on the g5 quad with the nvidia  
quadro fx 4500 card I would like to build a stereo version of  
Radiance. If I remove the -DNOSTEREO argument from mach= in the OS X  
case in makeall it fails because in glrad.c it can't find X11/ 
extensions/SGIStereo.h. Is there some documentation about what the  
code is trying to do so that I can substitute the appropriate os x  
includes. I don't have access to an sgi box so it is difficult to  
figure out what is in the includes.


Thank you,


Doug Reeder
